lines.i: Information regarding the disposition of the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.4"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10652)/@code="67661-9" EMS disposition Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Disposition" (CONF:10654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10653)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11003)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number Of Patients Transported Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.31)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11005)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Incident Disposition Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.32)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11007)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Transport Mode Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.33)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11009)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Transport Method Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.34)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11011)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reason For Choosing Destination Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.35)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11013)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prearrival Activation Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.36)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11015)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Condition At Destination Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11330)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Primary Destination Hospital Capability (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.104)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11331)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Destination Ward (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.186)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10652)/@code="67661-9" EMS disposition Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Disposition" (CONF:10654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10653)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11003)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number Of Patients Transported Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.31)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11005)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Incident Disposition Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.32)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11007)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Transport Mode Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.33)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11009)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Transport Method Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.34)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11011)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reason For Choosing Destination Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.35)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11013)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prearrival Activation Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.36)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11015)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Condition At Destination Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11330)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Primary Destination Hospital Capability (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.104)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11331)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Destination Ward (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.186)
